login_screen.page1:
Create missions and
make your own Manito!
login_screen.page2:
Guess who your Manito
was that helped you!
login_screen.page3:
Become a Manito and
secretly help your friends!
login_screen.page4:
Leave a record of how you
helped your friends!
login_screen.page5:
Enjoy Manito with friends
in your daily life!

bottom_nav.tutorial1: This screen allows you to manage friends.
bottom_nav.tutorial2: You can check your completed mission records.
bottom_nav.tutorial3:
Create and send missions to your friends.
One of your friends will become your Manito.
bottom_nav.tutorial4: You can check and perform missions sent to you by friends.
bottom_nav.fcm_snack_message: To receive notifications, you need to enable them in settings.

setting_screen.title: Settings
setting_screen.logout_dialog_message: Are you sure you want to log out?
setting_screen.delete_account_dialog_message: Once you delete your account, it cannot be recovered.
setting_screen.restart_body: Tap here to restart the app.

friends_search_screen.title: Find Friends
friends_search_screen.request_self: You cannot send a friend request to yourself.

friends_blacklist_screen.title: Blocked List
friends_blacklist_screen.dialog_message: Unblocking this user will allow them to search for you.

modify_screen.title: Edit Profile
modify_screen.name: Name
modify_screen.modify_error: Failed to update profile due to an unknown error.

friends_detail_screen.dialog_message: Are you sure you want to block this friend?
friends_detail_screen.snack_message: Failed to block friend due to an unknown error.
friends_detail_screen.empty_history: No Manito history with this friend.

mission_screen.title: Outbox Missions
mission_screen.max_snack_message: You can create a maximum of 3 missions.
mission_screen.pending_mission_tooltip: If no friend accepts within the remaining time, it will be automatically deleted.
mission_screen.accept_mission_tooltip: Your Manito is processing the mission.

mission_create_screen.title: Create Mission
mission_create_screen.dialog_message: Once created, missions cannot be canceled or modified.
mission_create_screen.error_snack_message: Failed to create mission due to an unknown error.

mission_guess_screen.title: Guess Your Manito
mission_guess_screen.hint_text: Please write who you think your Manito is.
mission_guess_screen.guess_updage_error: An error occurred while checking your Manito.

manito_screen.title: To-Do Missions
manito_screen.propose_tooltip: All missions are first-come, first-served (1 person only)

auto_reply_screen.title: Auto Reply Settings
auto_reply_screen.hint: This message will be automatically sent to your friends if you fail to post.

mission_propose_screen.title: Secretly help {nickname}!
mission_propose_screen.dialog_message: Once you accept a mission, it cannot be canceled.
mission_propose_screen.ad_snack_message:
The ad is not ready.
Please try again shortly.

manito_post_screen.dialog_message: End the mission and notify your friend.
manito_post_screen.post_failed: Failed to send post due to an unknown error.
manito_post_screen.error_snack_message: Failed to save due to an unknown error.
manito_post_screen.title: Record Mission
manito_post_screen.todo_mission: Please write how you completed the mission.

firebase_handler.friend_request_body: A new friend request has arrived.

kakao_login_webview.error_snack_message: An error occurred during authentication processing.
